description:
The Lite Drive 1000XL is a robust and versatile front light, offering an impressive 1000 lumens of light. Its lightweight and durable CNC-machined aluminum body has integrated cooling fin so you can run the light at maximum brightness for longer. With eight different output modes, ranging from a striking 1000-lumen daytime flash to a 15 lumen flash that can run for an impressive 87 hour, this light is bright enough to hit the trails on the weekends and light your dusky weekday commutes.

  • 8 lighting modes, 4 in steady and 4 in flashing; steady: 1,000 lumens over drive (1.5h), 500 lumens (3h), 250 lumens (5.5h), 150 lumens (9h), flash 1–150 lumens (19h), 2–15 lumens (87h), pulse flash 1–150 lumens (17h), and day flash–1,000 lumens (7.5h)
  • The MOR (Maximum Optical Reflection) lens ensures efficient and uniform light distribution
  • Easy 1-button interface takes you through all your light’s modes
  • Integrated USB plug on the front light means you don’t need to carry a charging cable – full charging takes ~3 hours
  • LED charging indicator lets you know light needs charging, when it’s charging and when it’s ready to go
  • Versatile silicone strap securely attaches it to a wide range of handlebar shapes and sizes
  • IPX7 waterproofing protects your light from heavy downpours
name: Lezyne Lite Drive 1000XL Front Light
